TopicTitle: Get KSP For 40% Off at the Humble Store!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/54f228792698f618e2db649dc763a9d5/tumblr_inline_neospquc4a1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong> is on sale for 40% off at the <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>!</p>

<p>Heard a lot about KSP and want to get hands-on before we get to beta? Maybe you just want to hoard copies as holiday gifts. Either way, the <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>'s got your back in their first birthday sale!</p>

Nice. This should attract a lot of more new players.

Nice post count, btw.

So, this is a monthly thing?

It's definitely not the first time.
